DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Evaluation Canola Protein Comparison With Soy Protein
DOC.detailed_description: The physiological effect single administration two different industrially manufacture canola protein ( hydrolyzate , isolate ) investigate compare soy protein . Twenty-eight healthy men ( ø 25 year ) complete double-blind , placebo-controlled , crossover study . The subject randomly divide two group ( group A : canola protein isolate soy protein isolate group B : canola protein hydrolyzate soy protein isolate ) . After three-day run-in period , intervention day , subject consume protein drink contain 30.0 g protein powder add final volume 500 mL tomato juice . Half subject group consume protein drink contain 30.0 g canola protein , half receive soy protein . After take fast blood sample morning intervention day , blood sample draw regular interval period eight hour . At end run-in period intervention day , 24-hour urine collection take place . Within second experiment ( 4 week ) , protein source cross within four subgroup second intervention .
